explains: adv. 错误地；曲解地，被误解地

sentences.en: He mistakenly believed that his family would stand by him.
sentences.cn: 他误以为他的家人会支持他。

sentences.en: He says they mistakenly believed the standard licences they held were sufficient.
sentences.cn: 他说他们错误地以为持有标准许可证就足够了。

sentences.en: Students sometimes mistakenly assume that the section contains literature books.
sentences.cn: 学生们有时会错误地认为这个部分包含了文学书籍。
